ValidationRule.description: Intake PMÂ must select different value other than "New" for Request Status field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName='Request_OEM_Customized_Solution_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='Request_OEM_Tech_Partner_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='Request_OEM_OPK_Support'), OR( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "R09.02 GBL Services/CEM Admin"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "R09.02 Global Services/CEM Mgr"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "R09.02 Solution Architect"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "R16.10 Solution Architect"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "IT GBL Data Load"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "IT TA User"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "SysAdmin Ops Eng"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "System Administrator") ), ISPICKVAL( Request_Status__c , 'New'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Select different value other than "New"
